newsitem.title: USA: Wall Street stocks little changed at open.
newsitem.headline: Wall Street stocks little changed at open.

text.p: U.S. stocks were steady at the open on Tuesday as investors took a cautious approach ahead of the conclusion of the Federal Reserve's Open Market Committee (FOMC) meeting.
The Dow Industrials was unchanged at 5,699, while the NASDAQ Index rose one to 1,132 and the S&P Index was off fractionally at 667
The 30-year U.S. Treasury bond was down 2/32 to yield 6.80 percent.
